Imagine building a treehouse. Normally you build it first, THEN check if it's safe. Secure development is like checking for safety at EVERY step - making sure each board is strong BEFORE nailing it in, not after the treehouse is built!

In this lesson, we'll learn about secure software development lifecycle (ssdlc) in a way that makes sense. We'll start simple, use real examples, and build your understanding step by step. By the end, you'll understand the core ideas and why they matter!
